text: I have a chemical imbalance. Ive been on paxil, prozac, lithium etc. Ive had to take klonapin and zanax for my maniac and sleeping periods. I currently dont take anything and i feel alot better. I think some of those drugs alter who you are.

text: When I picked up my lexapro, klonapin, and a one time scrip for a tranquilizer for an upcoming dental procedure, I paid $12. I almost cried. Having health insurance, even for just these couple of months, has been amazing. I wish meds were always this affordable

text: I still have side effects from klonapin, neuro says that may never go away....but the seizures are under control for the most part. However, if I forget a single dose, the seizures come within a day. So I have to be very careful and remember to take it

text: Shit you wanna talk depression. Imagine stocking up Klonapin for 3 months getting ready to end it. Then, you just pop them all one night after kissing your family goodnight cause you cant stand the pain that has ultimately been created in your mind. Shit is FUCKED!

text: I originally went on Zoloft for my Lyme. I didn't know yet that I had bipolar disorder and when I did find out, they took me off and the pain! O! I am on that stuff for LIFE. Plus Klonapin. It is the best mood stabilizer that still allows me to write.
